articles.title: Rakesh Jhunjhunwala, billionaire investor who launched Akasa Air, passes away at 62
articles.description: Rakesh Jhunjhunwala, also known as ‘India’s Warren Buffett’, began investing in the stock market in the early 1980s with just Rs 5,000 which grew to $5.8 billion (around Rs 46,000 crore), according to Forbes magazine.

articles.title: Salman Rushdie Off Ventilator After Stabbing, Attacker Pleads "Not Guilty"
articles.description: Author Salman Rushdie was taken off the ventilator last night as he remained hospitalised with serious injuries after being stabbed at a literary event in New York, multiple reports said.
